jvx.numeric

Class PnPreconditionerJacobi

  • java.lang.Object
    • jvx.numeric.PnPreconditioner
      • jvx.numeric.PnPreconditionerJacobi

  • public class PnPreconditionerJacobi
extends PnPreconditioner
    Perform a diagonal (Jacobi) preconditioning from the left to the a linear equation system smat.x=b.
